Description: Led the development of Gelato House Franchise Ltd's ice cream ordering app during a four-month project lifecycle. Engineered an intuitive four-step user flow for customization and order placement. Conducted comprehensive landscape analysis and user research to align features with market demands. Leveraged Figma for rapid prototyping, with Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop for high-fidelity design execution.

Architected and developed this portfolio website using React, leveraging its component-based architecture for optimal performance and maintainability. Conceptualized the layout in Figma, ensuring a cohesive design strategy before implementation. Prioritized an engaging user experience with a clean aesthetic to effectively showcase professional work. Implemented responsive design principles to ensure seamless functionality across diverse devices and screen sizes.

Spearheaded the redesign of Twilight Clinic's website, emphasizing simplicity, cleanliness, and elegance. Initiated the process with meticulous design conceptualization in Figma, followed by implementation using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Incorporated advanced coding practices, including custom properties and utility classes, to enhance code quality and long-term maintainability.

Orchestrated a strategic redesign of Flystein's landing page. Executed in-depth competitor analysis and synthesized current travel industry user trends from authoritative publications. Leveraged these insights to inform an innovative design approach. Utilized Adobe XD to create a reimagined landing page, prioritizing enhanced user experience and visual coherence.
